EmailTemplate.subject: Shoppers Spend More When This Happens
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Did you know: consumers spend more when no one is looking? That’s especially true of self-service ordering for foodservice in c-stores. There’s no one to judge when you order a hoagie and a large side plus a dessert and, okay, maybe an extra sandwich. It’s true. But not only does self-service lead shoppers to increase their average basket size, it also makes the foodservice operation faster and more efficient for you. Learn more in our free, on-demand webinar: Get More Customers in the Door and More Orders Going out Your C-Store. <[[https://event.webcasts.com/starthere.jsp?ei=1403942&tp_key=0f46af1ce5&sti=email&utm_source=omeda&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=WEBINAR_RISNews&utm_keyword=]]> ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> It’s a timely topic, since foodservice represented 35% of inside gross profits for c-stores, according to NACS.
